android.manifestAdditions:
<manifest android:installLocation="auto"> <supports-screens android:anyDensity="true" android:largeScreens="true" android:normalScreens="true" android:smallScreens="true" />
<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.VIBRATE" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.CHANGE_NETWORK_STATE" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE" /> <uses-permission android:name="com.tencent.mtt.extension.Player" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.RESTART_PACKAGES" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_FIND_LOCATION" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.KILL_BACKGROUND_PROCESSES" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.SYSTEM_OVERLAY_WINDOW" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INSTALL_PACKAGES" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.RECEIVE_SMS" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.SEND_SMS" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.WRITE_SMS" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.READ_SMS" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.webkit.permission.PLUGIN" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.READ_SMS" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.WRITE_SETTINGS" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.READ_SETTINGS" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.MOUNT_UNMOUNT_FILESYSTEMS" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.GET_TASKS" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.READ_LOGS" />
<uses-sdk android:minSdkVersion="8" android:targetSdkVersion="17" />
<application android:allowBackup="true" >
<activity android:name="com.unionpay.uppay.PayActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.LogoActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:launchMode="singleTask" android:theme="@style/Transparent" > <meta-data android:name="ANZHIUSERCENTE_VERSIONS" android:value="3.2" > </meta-data> </activity> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.LoginActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:launchMode="singleTask" android:windowSoftInputMode="stateAlwaysVisible" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.UserCenterMainActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:launchMode="singleTask" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.UserDetailActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:launchMode="singleTask" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.RegisterActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:launchMode="singleTask" android:windowSoftInputMode="stateHidden|adjustPan" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.UpdateStarActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.UpdateQQActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:windowSoftInputMode="stateAlwaysVisible" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.UpdateNickActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:windowSoftInputMode="stateAlwaysVisible" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.AnzhiCurrencyActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:launchMode="singleTask" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.PwdSettingActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.AnzhiMessageActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:launchMode="singleTask" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.PwdSettingClearActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.AccountSafeActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:windowSoftInputMode="stateHidden" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.BindTelActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:windowSoftInputMode="stateAlwaysVisible" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.UnbindTelActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:windowSoftInputMode="stateAlwaysVisible" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.CurrencyChargeWebViewActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:launchMode="singleTask" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.ChargeHistoryWebViewActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:launchMode="singleTask" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.ConsumHistoryWebViewActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:launchMode="singleTask" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.GameChargeWebViewActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:launchMode="singleTask" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.OrderRecodeWebViewActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:launchMode="singleTask" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.FeedbackWebViewActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:launchMode="singleTask" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.OpenLoginforQQActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:launchMode="singleTask" android:theme="@android:style/Theme.Dialog" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.OpenLoginforWeiboActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:launchMode="singleTask" android:theme="@android:style/Theme.Dialog" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.BindEmailActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:windowSoftInputMode="stateAlwaysVisible" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.UnbindEmailActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:windowSoftInputMode="stateAlwaysVisible" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.MessageDetailsActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:windowSoftInputMode="stateHidden|adjustPan" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.FindPwdActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:windowSoftInputMode="stateAlwaysVisible" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.AccountSafeWindowActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:theme="@style/mydialog" android:windowSoftInputMode="stateHidden|adjustPan" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.NoticeActivtiy" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:theme="@style/Transparent" android:windowSoftInputMode="stateHidden|adjustPan" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.LoadingActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:launchMode="singleTask" android:theme="@android:style/Theme.Translucent.NoTitleBar.Fullscreen" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.UcenterOfficialLoginActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:launchMode="singleTask" android:theme="@android:style/Theme.Light.NoTitleBar" > </activity> <!-- =====================================华丽的分割线======================================== --> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.ModifyPwdActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:launchMode="singleTask" android:windowSoftInputMode="stateAlwaysVisible" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.ResetPwdActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:launchMode="singleTask" android:windowSoftInputMode="stateAlwaysVisible" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.FindAccountFailActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:launchMode="singleTask" android:windowSoftInputMode="stateHidden|adjustPan" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.NoticeDetailActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:launchMode="singleTask" android:windowSoftInputMode="stateHidden|adjustPan" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.AnzhiGameBbsActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:launchMode="singleTask" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.GameGiftActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:launchMode="singleTask" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.RechargeRedPacketWebActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:launchMode="singleTask" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.GiftBagDetailActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:launchMode="singleTask" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.MessageActivitty" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:launchMode="singleTask" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.GiftbagRecordActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:launchMode="singleTask" > </activity>
<receiver android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.control.NetListenerReceiver" > <intent-filter> <action android:name="android.net.conn.CONNECTIVITY_CHANGE" /> </intent-filter> </receiver>
<!-- 以下是银联支付插件 --> <activity android:name="com.unionpay.upomp.tbow.paymain" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:screenOrientation="portrait" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.unionpay.upomp.tbow.activity.Pm" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:screenOrientation="portrait" /> <activity android:name="com.unionpay.upomp.tbow.activity.Pi" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:screenOrientation="portrait" /> <activity android:name="com.unionpay.upomp.tbow.activity.Pr" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:screenOrientation="portrait" /> <activity android:name="com.unionpay.upomp.tbow.activity.Mk" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:launchMode="singleTask" android:screenOrientation="portrait" android:theme="@style/Theme.FloatActivity" /> <activity android:name="com.unionpay.upomp.tbow.activity.Um" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:screenOrientation="portrait" /> <activity android:name="com.unionpay.upomp.tbow.activity.Ur" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:screenOrientation="portrait" /> <activity android:name="com.unionpay.upomp.tbow.activity.Up" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:screenOrientation="portrait" /> <activity android:name="com.unionpay.upomp.tbow.activity.Ui" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:screenOrientation="portrait" /> <activity android:name="com.unionpay.upomp.tbow.activity.Ua" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:screenOrientation="portrait" /> <activity android:name="com.unionpay.upomp.tbow.activity.Cm" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:screenOrientation="portrait" /> <activity android:name="com.unionpay.upomp.tbow.activity.Car" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:screenOrientation="portrait" /> <activity android:name="com.unionpay.upomp.tbow.activity.Ca" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:screenOrientation="portrait" /> <activity android:name="com.unionpay.upomp.tbow.activity.Cbr" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:screenOrientation="portrait" /> <activity android:name="com.unionpay.upomp.tbow.activity.Cb" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:screenOrientation="portrait" /> <activity android:name="com.unionpay.upomp.tbow.activity.Ci" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:screenOrientation="portrait" /> <activity android:name="com.alipay.android.mini.window.sdk.MiniPayActivity" android:configChanges="orientation" android:excludeFromRecents="true" android:exported="false" android:launchMode="singleTop" android:process="com.alipay.sdk" android:screenOrientation="portrait" android:theme="@style/MspAppTheme" android:windowSoftInputMode="adjustResize|stateHidden" > <intent-filter android:priority="800" > <action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" />
<category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT" /> </intent-filter> </activity> <activity android:name="com.alipay.android.mini.window.sdk.MiniWebActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboardHidden|navigation" android:excludeFromRecents="true" android:exported="false" android:launchMode="singleTop" android:process="com.alipay.sdk" android:theme="@style/MspAppTheme" > <intent-filter> <action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" />
<category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT" /> </intent-filter> </activity>
<service android:name="com.alipay.android.app.MspService" android:exported="false" android:process="com.alipay.sdk" > <intent-filter android:priority="800" /> </service>
</application> </manifest>
